## Important Dates 

- **Registration Opens:** October 1, 2023
- **Abstract Submission Deadline:** February 2, 2024
- **Notification of Abstract Acceptance:** February 16, 2024
- **Registration Deadline:** March 1, 2024
- **Conference Dates:** April 25-26, 2024

## Registration

Registration for the conference is now open. Please visit the [Registration](registration.html) page for more information and to register for the conference.

## Abstract Submission

Abstracts for presentations can be submitted until the deadline of March 1, 2024. Authors will be notified of the acceptance of their abstracts by March 15, 2024.

For detailed guidelines on abstract submission and to submit your abstract, please visit the [Abstract Submission](abstract.html) page.

We look forward to receiving your submissions and sharing your research during the conference!
